about_the_game:
The Oito Line is a 105.4 km long line connecting Matsumoto Station in Nagano Prefecture to Itoigawa Station in Niigata Prefecture. The 70.1 km route between Matsumoto Station and Minami-Kotani Station, which is under the jurisdiction of JR East, is well-known as a stop for customers visiting the mountain climbing and snow resort areas represented by Shinano-Omachi and Hakuba. The "Super Azusa" limited express train runs directly from Shinjuku Station, and the line is also used as a commuter and school route in the Matsumoto area. From the driving scenery, you can experience the changing scenery of Shinshu from winter to spring with the magnificent snow-capped Northern Alps, cherry blossoms along the tracks, and rice paddies filled with water for the summer.

Highlights

  • Azusa River Railroad Bridge / Shimatakamatsu to Azusa Bridge
    　Cross the Azusa River flowing from the Northern Alps.
  • Northern Alps / Azumi-Kutsugake~Shinano-Tokiwa
    　You will enjoy the contrast between winter and spring with the snow-capped Northern Alps and beautifully blooming cherry blossoms.
    [Shinano-Omachi Station
    　Shinano-Omachi Station is the gateway to the Tateyama-Kurobe Alpine Route, a mountain tourism route that runs through the Northern Alps to Toyama. The station, with its hut-like station building, rail bridge, and spacious interior, conveys the bustle of the area.　

Route information

  • Section: Oito Line Matsumoto→Minami-Otari Outbound
  • Total length: 70.1 km
  • Number of stations: 33
  • Safety equipment: ATS-Ps

Train schedules that can be operated

  • Train number: 5329M
  • Type/Destination: Local Train to Minami-Otari
  • Station section that can be operated: Matsumoto to Minami-Otari
  • Type of train: Series 211, 3 cars
  • Responsible for real voice train announcements: Matsumoto Crew Supervisory Center

  • Train number: 3113M
  • Type/Destination: Local Train to Hotaka
  • Station section that can be operated: Matsumoto to Hotaka
  • Type of train: Series 211, 3 cars
  • Responsible for real voice train announcements: Matsumoto Crew Supervisory Center

  • Train number: 3241M
  • Type/Destination: Local Train to Shinano-Omachi
  • Station section that can be operated: Matsumoto to Shinano-Omachi
  • Type of train: Series 211, 3 cars
  • Responsible for real voice train announcements: Matsumoto Crew Supervisory Center

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i (6th generation) 4Cores or AMD Ryzen (1st generation) 4Cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 10 series (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: need resolution 1920×1080@60Hz,DirectX 11.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
